name: botbuilder-toybox-prompts
author: stevenic@microsoft.com
description: Lightweight prompt system for Bot Builder v4.

scripts.build-docs: typedoc --theme markdown --entryPoint botbuilder-toybox-prompts --excludePrivate --includeDeclarations --ignoreCompilerErrors --module amd --out ..\..\docs\botbuilder-toybox-prompts .\lib\index.d.ts --hideGenerator --name "Bot Builder Toybox - Prompts" --readme none
